title: GPS-based Sunrise and Sunset Time Determination
name: LGF_AstroClock
description: This function calculates the times of sunrise and sunset based on the local time for a specific place on Earth.

input.name: enable
input.description: TRUE: Activates the functionality of the FB

input.name: positionGps
input.description: GPS position to calculate the time of sunrise and sunset

input.name: offsetSunrise
input.description: Offset to sunrise (added to sunrise time, considered at `isDaytime`, negative time allowed)

input.name: positionGps
input.description: Offset to sunset (added to sunset time, considered at `isDaytime`, negative time allowed)

output.name: valid
output.description: TRUE: Valid set of output values available at the FB

output.name: busy
output.description: TRUE: FB is active and new output values can be expected

output.name: error
output.description: FALSE: No error / TRUE: An error occurred during the execution of the FB

output.name: status
output.description: 16#0000-16#7FFF: Status of the FB / 16#8000-16#FFFF: Error identification

output.name: subFunctionStatus
output.description: Status or return value of called FB's, FC's and system blocks

output.name: isDaytime
output.description: TRUE: If the local time of the controller is between “sunrise” and “sunset”

user_defined_types.name: LGF_typeGPS_DD
user_defined_types.description: Datatype for GPS Coordinates in decimal degrees. For a whole GPS Data set.

member.name: latitude
member.description: Degrees latitude with decimal places (Unit: degree decimal), North = positive; South = negative) valid value range [-90.00000..90.00000]

member.name: longitude
member.description: Degrees longitude with decimal places (Unit: degree decimal), East = positive; West = negative) valid value range [-180.00000..180.00000]

description_zh:
该函数块FB用于根据地球上一个特定位置的本地时间计算日出和日落的时间。它接受GPS位置信息，并可以添加自定义的日出和日落时间偏移。FB将输出有效的计算结果，并指示是否处于白天时间。

输入参数包括：
- enable：激活FB的功能
- positionGps：用于计算日出和日落时间的GPS位置
- offsetSunrise：日出时间偏移（加到日出时间上）
- offsetSunset：日落时间偏移（加到日落时间上）

输出参数包括：
- valid：输出值有效
- busy：FB正在执行计算
- error：执行过程中是否发生错误
- status：FB的状态或错误代码
- subFunctionStatus：调用FB、FC或系统块的状态或返回值
- actualLocalTime：当前本地时间
- sunriseTime：日出时间
- sunsetTime：日落时间
- isDaytime：当前控制器本地时间是否在日出和日落之间

FB首先检查输入的经纬度值是否在有效范围内，然后根据这些值和系统时间计算日出和日落时间。如果输入值无效，FB将输出错误状态。如果计算成功，FB将输出有效的日出、日落时间和当前是否为白天。

注意：该FB假设系统时间已经与UTC时间同步，并且没有使用ENO机制进行错误处理。
